greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n)=n if n=1 or if n=prime. Otherwise, n=4 if n is even and n=1 if n is odd.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: a[n_] := If[PrimeQ[n] || n == 1, n, If[EvenQ[n], 4, 1] ]; Table[a[n], {n,1,25}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 26 2016 *)
results.author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_, Dec 01 2007
